basics.label: PhD Candidate in History
basics.summary: Doctoral researcher at C2DH. Background in political science and history, with a focus on digital humanities. Experienced research assistant with interests in historical source analysis, digital preservation, and computing for history.

work.name: Swiss Federal Institute of Technology Lausanne (EPFL)
work.summary: Worked on the Lausanne Time Machine project correcting historical digitization using HTR.

work.name: Fribourg State Court
work.summary: Classified archives, authored public exhibition texts, and identified locations in historical photographs.

work.name: University of Zurich
work.summary: Collected historical economic data for the FNS project on 19th century Swiss growth and welfare.

work.name: Institute of Political Studies (IEP) – UniL
work.summary: Contributed to the SINERGIA project on elites in Switzerland; archival work and database entry.

work.name: Swiss Elite Observatory UniL
work.summary: Entered and processed data for research on Swiss elites in multiple fields.

work.name: PrEP School Lausanne
work.summary: Prepared students for university entrance exams; created constitutional law materials and mock exams.

work.name: Admission Office, University of Lausanne
work.position: Specialized File Manager and Administrative Assistant
work.summary: Managed Master’s application files, handled departmental correspondence, and performed clerical support.
